page.title: 17 More on modern farming...
page.content: Machinery is also used in the dairy,giving the farmer a quicker and more profitable way of getting milk.There is now a machine that tests each individual cows milk so the farmer can decide which are the best cows to keep. The only main problem the farmers have are conservationists.They get upset when farmers pull down hedges and trees so as to fit large machines into his fields or expand his area. So farmers do not lead an easy life,either getting money and upsetting conservationists or losing money and becoming a conservationist.
